div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 295 Delos, 1910 (315b) Burial: c. 120 B.C. (T); c. 88 (Lewis, Hackens) Contents: 92 AR, 1 AE. From excavations Athens: 92 New Style tetradr. 1 AE Disposition: Athens Roussel, Délos, p. 48, note 4 (50) † Thompson, Athens (Delos | Γ), pp. 519-20 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 283 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516 The one bronze is mentioned only in Svoronos' inventory
